select
example.distinct
from ACCTYPE
order by ${example.orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ACCTYPE (INST_ID, TYPECODE, VERNO_CTX, CLASSID, ISOCODE, CURRCODE, CURRCODE2, SRVID, FMTID, DESCR, BANKACCCODE, NOW, ACCLEN, ALLOWSVC, CAT_PARAMS, BRKTYPE, BRKOFFSET, CAT_ACCTMRKUP_ID, ACCLOGGING, MAXOVRRDAMT, MAXOVRRDCRLMPRCNT, CAT_ACCTRISK_ID, GENACCNUM, ACCTYPESEQ, ACCNUMFRMT) values (#{instId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{typecode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vernoCtx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{classid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isocode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{currcode2,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{srvid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fmtid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankacccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{now,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{acclen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{allowsvc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brktype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{brkoffset,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{catAcctmrkupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{acclogging,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxovrrdamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxovrrdcrlmprcnt,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{catAcctriskId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{genaccnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{acctypeseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accnumfrmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
